Linus and Luke discuss reports that Meta allegedly allowed accounts to rack up multiple violations before taking action, raising serious questions about the company’s safety policies. They also dive into Meta’s broader approach to regulation, accountability, and how much a CEO really shapes a company’s ethics.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=35igp1OBRY0

title: Meta This is INSANE

author: LMG Clips

Linus and Luke discuss Google denying it trains AI on your emails while still removing basic Gmail features like category tabs and even spell‑check if you disable its “smart” AI tools. They dive into how overused “intelligent” features erode trust, how companies misuse AI, and the broader tension between AI’s genuine utility and its growing negative reputation.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=35igp1OBRY0

title: Google's New 'Smart' Features Are Stupid
